underlying_goal: To implement a daily scheduled auto-update for AI CLI tools and integrate `bun` as a package manager for Linux.
primary_success: Correcting the user's partial bash script with clear explanations of the fixes (e.g., `brew upgrade` needing a package name, launchd env vars) and then using path-based detection for robustness after a code review.
brief_summary: The user planned a new feature to auto-update AI tools and add `bun` support. Claude implemented the plan using parallel agents, then guided the user in correcting a partially implemented bash script, explaining the fixes. After a code review, Claude applied further improvements, resulting in a robust, complete feature.
